name: Left Right Mind
tagline: Your one stop design, technology & digital team
description:
Left Right Mind is a one stop design, technology & consulting consulting team with expertise in the following services. 
Digital Experience
Human behavior and market insights define our design thinking and lead our technology decisions. Our passion for understanding customer motivations and deep user empathy help us deliver experiences that will empower you to forge lasting relationships with your audiences 
Digital Enterprise
We thrive on solving complex business problems creatively. Our teams are configured to meet tailored requirements that are unique to you and your business. Intuitive design, intelligent implementation, efficient sustenance models and robust data sanctity form the bedrock of all that we build and co-create with you
Digital Incubation
We are true collaborators at heart and if you have an idea or a product that needs us; we would like to be there for you. Our cross functional teams across design, technology and digital marketing provide innovation consulting that can help build and take your dream to market
Digital Solutions
We recognize the force of digital disruption and its impact on businesses – new and old, small and large. To this end, we take the time to discover, design and build products and services that help increase productivity and bring efficiencies to your business processes. Our digital solutions are designed for viability and make considerations for your unique operational constraints
Digital Marketing
Our multi-disciplinary approach helps you grow your existing customer base and enter new markets. Digital strategists, creative teams, experience designers and technologists work together to help design, deliver, assess and optimize campaigns that can help drive customer engagement and acquisition
READ MORE...
